alert.note: Alert for Mercer; Rock Island (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS QuadCities (Eastern Iowa and Northwestern Illinois - Quad Cities)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued November 05 at 8:01AM CDT until November 05 at 8:30AM CDT by NWS QuadCities
info.description: The National Weather Service in the Quad Cities has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Rock Island County in northwestern Illinois... North central Mercer County in northwestern Illinois... Cedar County in east central Iowa... Scott County in east central Iowa... Northeastern Muscatine County in east central Iowa... Southwestern Clinton County in east central Iowa... * Until 830 AM CDT. * At 800 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Rochester to Wilton to Millersburg, moving northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. At 755 AM a 59 MPH gust was measured at the Muscatine Airport. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Severe thunderstorms will be near... Durant, Wilton, Rochester, Stockton, Cedar Valley Park and Cedar Valley around 805 AM CDT. Tipton, Sunbury, Tipton Matthews Airport and Cedar County Fairgrounds around 810 AM CDT. Bennett, Taylor Ridge, New Liberty, Bennett Park, Camp Liberty, Plainview and Loud Thunder Scout Camp around 815 AM CDT. Stanwood, Milan, Andalusia, Oak Grove, Clarence, Dixon, Big Rock, Sherman Park, Coyne Center and Buffalo Shores around 820 AM CDT. Other locations in the path of these severe thunderstorms include Buffalo, Lowden, Wheatland, Calamus, Credit Island, Blackhawk State Park, West Lake Park, Fruitland, Indian Bluff Golf Course, Moline Quad-City Airport, Davenport, Moline, Rock Island, Mississippi Valley Fairgrounds, Rock Island Arsenal and Davenport Municipal Airport. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...OBSERVED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with these storms, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
